SADLT I HAVE BUGGER ALL ESSENCE FOR A 2150 ENCHANT Q.Q

replies.body: I'm just hoping my two most played champs never get an exclusive skin cuz I want to own all their skins. I doubt Quinn would get one because she isn't popular but Riven is in there with the popular champs. We all know a lot of people who main a champ will drop like 300 bucks on chests to get a hextech skin so it makes sense Riot would only give them to extremely popular champs so they can bait people into gambling heaps.

The Soulstealer Vayne skin? Tbh why would your friend spent beyond $50 after trying to get that skin through RNG, when they could just buy it instead after they found that RNGesis doesn't favour them?

Did I miss anything?

Idk man, gambling isn't something you do when you have a specific goal to meet, as the odds are always against you. Do it as a fun thing on the side, but never go hard I say.
It is an exclusive skin to Hextech Crafting like Hextech Annie.
